meaningMnemonic: When the <radical>moon</radical> is bright, it's easy to see that a <radical>pig</radical> is indeed a <kanji>pig</kanji>.
readingMnemonic: Legend has it that if you catch a <kanji>pig</kanji> in moonlight, it will tell you its secrets. Sure enough, this pig tells you it's from <reading>Bhuta</reading>n (ぶた).
